This method is called whenever the background changes its color.

This frame is used to set a new background.

board - Variable in class pxchat.gui.PaintBoard

broadcast(FrameQueue, boolean, int...) - Method in class pxchat.net.protocol.core.ServerFrameAdapter
Broadcasts data to all frame adapters registered with this server adapter and returns the number of clients reached.
broadcastTo(FrameQueue, boolean, int...) - Method in class pxchat.net.protocol.core.ServerFrameAdapter
